Array\\(.possibleIssue: Do not use the variadic Array constructor. The constructor is error-prone if arguments are added or removed. Use a literal instead.

Object\\(.possibleIssue: Do not use the Object constructor. This is disallowed for consistency. Use an object literal instead.

with.possibleIssue: Do not use the with keyword. It makes your code harder to understand and has been banned in strict mode since ES5.

@author.possibleIssue: Author credit is not required in source file.

.{80,}.possibleIssue: Try to not exceed 80 characters (columns) on a single line for readability. Wrap the line to the next if possible.
